xwikidoc.title: Documentation
xwikidoc.content:
1 Groups Documentation
1.1 Refactored pages
#set($sql = "where doc.web='Groups' and doc.content like '%@refactored%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Non refactored pages
#set($sql = "where doc.web='Groups' and doc.content not like '%@refactored%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Content pages with translations
#set($sql = "where doc.web='Groups' and doc.content like '%@type content%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Translations
#set($sql = "where doc.web='Groups' and doc.content like '%@type translation%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Sheets #** * Documentation of the Groups Section * @type content * @refactored ludovic *# #set($sql = "where doc.web='Groups' and doc.content like '%@type sheet%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Scripts
#set($sql = "where doc.web='Groups' and doc.content like '%@type script%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Services
#set($sql = "where doc.web='Groups' and doc.content like '%@type ajaxservice%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Templates
#set($sql = "where doc.web='Groups' and doc.content like '%@type template%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Mail Templates
#set($sql = "where doc.web='Groups' and doc.content like '%@type mailtemplate%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Pages with no type
#set($sql = "where doc.web='Groups' and doc.content not like '%@type%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Pages to delete
#set($sql = "where doc.web='Groups' and doc.content like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
#info("Old doc")
This explains where editable pages are for customizations of groups:
* [Translation pages>Translations] * [Interstitial for Group Leaders>CreateNewGroupDone]
1.1 Welcome pages
* [Main default Welcome page>WebHomeWelcome] * [Messages default Welcome page>MessagesWelcome] * [Create Message default Welcome page>CreateMessageWelcome] * [Curriculum default Welcome page>CurriculumWelcome] * [Members default Welcome page>MembersWelcome] * [Documentation default Welcome page>DocumentationWelcome]
1.1 e-Mails
* [Invitation eMail received by invitee>MailTemplateSendInvitation] * [Request eMail received by admins>MailTemplateSendRequest] * [Request eMail received by requestor>MailTemplateCreateRequest] * [Accept Request eMail received by requestor>MailTemplateAcceptRequest] * [Reject Request eMail received by requestor>MailTemplateRejectRequest] * [Create Space eMail received by space creator>MailTemplateCreateSpace] * [Join Space eMail received by joining member>MailTemplateJoinSpace] * [New Message notification eMail>MailTemplateCreateMessage] * [Resource Edited eMail>MailTemplateUpdateNotification]
1.1 Code
1.1.1 Macros
* [Macros>Macros]
1.1.1 Sheets
* [Group WebHome Sheet>WebHomeSheet] * [Group Members Sheet>MembersSheet] * [Group Messages Sheet>MessagesSheet] * [Group Curriculum Sheet>CurriculumSheet] * [Group Curriculum Search Sheet>ContributionsSearchSheet] * [Group Curriculum Contributions Sheet>ContributionsSheet] * [Group Documentation Sheet>DocumentationSheet] * [Join Group Sheet>JoinGroupSheet] * [Request Membership Sheet>RequestMembershipSheet] * [Invitate Members Sheet>InviteMembersSheet] * [EditInfoSheet] * [EditMastheadSheet]
1.1.1 Services
* [EditSpaceUserProfileService] * [SaveSpaceUserProfileService] * [ViewSpaceUserProfileService] * [EditWelcomeBlockService] * [SaveWelcomeBlockService] * [ViewWelcomeBlockService] * [AcceptMembershipRequestService] * [RejectMembershipRequestService]
1.1.1 Pages
* [How To Create>HowToCreate] * [Create New Group>CreateNewGroup] * [Browse Groups>BrowseGroupsbySubject] * [Featured Groups>FeaturedGroups] * [View Group>ViewGroup]
1.1.1 Template Space Page
* [Groups_TemplateSpace.WebHome] * [Groups_TemplateSpace.Members] * [Groups_TemplateSpace.JoinGroup] * [Groups_TemplateSpace.RequestMembership] * [Groups_TemplateSpace.InviteMembers] * [Groups_TemplateSpace.Messages] * [Groups_TemplateSpace.Curriculum] * [Curriculum - View All Contributions>Groups_TemplateSpace.Contributions] * [Curriculum - Search Group Resources>Groups_TemplateSpace.ContributionsSearch] * [Groups_TemplateSpace.Documentation]
1.1.1 Scripts
* [Adds User to XWiki.AllGroups on Production>http://www.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Admin/FixAllGroupMembership]: JIRA BUG 2432
